author: Morgan Chalfant
title: Trump adviser on opening economy: Target zones where virus is less prevalent
description: White House economic adviser Larry Kudlow said Tuesday that the Trump administration could look at reopening businesses in areas where the coronavirus is less prevalent as it looks to stimulate the U.S. economy.Spe...
content:
